_header: Now ginneth the devil to wrathen him sore
_description: Henry Lovelich, Merlin — 27,852 lines in couplets

CamCCC80.First Lines:
Now gyneth the devel to wraththen him soreAs aftir scholen he
                    herkene & here wel more…
CamCCC80.Last Lines:
…So that owt of þe pres they hadden with gret pay[ne]And
                    with gret distres horsed hym agayne…
